basics.name: Korin Eckstrom
basics.label: Bioinformatician
basics.summary: Experienced bioinformatician with a demonstrated history of working in both the biotech/pharma industry & academic settings. Skilled in R & Statistical Data Analysis, Whole Exome Sequencing, Metagenomics, RNA-seq, and other forms of Next Generation sequencing. Experience working with data from major sequencing platforms, including Illumina, Oxford Nanopore, and PacBio.

work.name: Genentech
work.summary: Bioinformatician within Early Research & Development. Maintained & developed production level workflows for analysis of clinical, preclinical, and safety assessment data. Involved in cloud migration & framework, benchmarking of new tools and workflows, and development of visualization applications.
highlights: R, bash, git, Nextflow, Python, Jira

courses: Thesis: Evaluating The Resistome And Microbial Composition During Food Waste Feeding And Composting On A Vermont Poultry Farm

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
